title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.

title: Doro Wot
instructions: Wash the chicken with hot water.
Boil the water and then add ingredients like paper (spicy), butter, oil, onion, and garlic.
Mix all the ingredients until they're cooked.
Add some water, then add the cooked chicken into it.
Wait for a few minutes or an hour for it to cook.
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a spicy, onion, smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy with Injera.

title: Caccabsaa
instructions: Cook the flour by mixing with water on the oven.
Grind the cooked Kitta into pieces.
Boil butter with spices and mix with the Kitta.
